meanings.definition: A type of pasta dish typically filled with cheese and served with marinara sauce.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed the delicious manicottis at the Italian restaurant.
meanings.sent2: She cooked manicottis for dinner last night.
meanings.sent3: The manicottis were so cheesy, they made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her love for manicottis was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked manicottis filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two plates of manicottis for the party.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed manicottis as a popular choice.
meanings.sent3: The table was full of manicottis, enough to feed an army.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the chatter of people enjoying their manicottis.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the manicottis with precision and care.
